00073                         $this->Lang = get_package( 'lang' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00103             function                add_stylesheets( $File )
00104             {
00105                   try
00106                   {
00107                         if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( dirname( $File ).'/res/css/css_list' ) )
00108                         {
00109                               $List = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( 
00110                                     dirname( $File ).'/res/css/css_list' , 'exploded'
00111                               );
00112                               
00113                               $PageComposerUtilities = get_package( 'page::page_composer_utilities' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00114                               
00115                               foreach( $List as $k => $v )
00116                               {
00117                                     $PageComposerUtilities->add_stylesheet( 
00118                                           str_replace( './' , '{http_host}/' , _get_package_relative_path( $File )."/res/css/$v" )
00119                                     );
00120                               }
00121                         }
00122                   }
00123                   catch( Exception $e )
00124                   {
00125                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00126                   }
00127             }

00155             function                parse( $File , $Variable , $Value )
00156             {
00157                   try
00158                   {
00159                         if( $this->Template === false )
00160                         {
00161                               $this->Template = $this->get_template( $File );
00162                         }
00163                         
00164                         if( strpos( $this->Template , '{'.$Variable.'}' ) !== false )
00165                         {
00166                               $Variable = $this->Security->get( $Variable , 'string' );
00167                               $this->Template = str_replace( '{'.$Variable.'}' , $Value.'{'.$Variable.'}' , $this->Template );
00168                         }
00169                   }
00170                   catch( Exception $e )
00171                   {
00172                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00173                   }
00174             }

00198             function                get_template_file_content( $TemplateName )
00199             {
00200                   try
00201                   {
00202                         $TemplateRelativePath = "/res/templates/$TemplateName.tpl";
00203                         $TemplatePath = dirname( __FILE__ ).$TemplateRelativePath;
00204                         if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $TemplatePath ) )
00205                         {
00206                               return( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $TemplatePath ) );
00207                         }
00208                         else
00209                         {
00210                               return( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).$TemplateRelativePath ) );
00211                         }
00212                   }
00213                   catch( Exception $e )
00214                   {
00215                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00216                   }
00217             }

00233             function                try_override_template()
00234             {
00235                   try
00236                   {
00237                         if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'template' , 'set' ) )
00238                         {
00239                               $TemplateName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'template' , 'command' );
00240 
00241                               if( $TemplateName == 'primitive' || 
00242                                     $TemplateName == 'standalone_view' || 
00243                                     $TemplateName == 'ajax_result_template' )
00244                               {
00245                                     $this->Template = $this->get_template_file_content( $TemplateName );
00246                               }
00247                               else
00248                               {
00249                                     throw( new Exception( "Template \"$TemplateName\" was not found" ) );
00250                               }
00251                         }
00252                   }
00253                   catch( Exception $e )
00254                   {
00255                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00256                   }
00257             }

00281             function                process_template_block( $PageName , &$Changed )
00282             {
00283                   try
00284                   {
00285                         if( $this->String->block_exists( $this->Template , 'template:'.$PageName , 'template:~'.$PageName ) )
00286                         {
00287                               $Changed = true;
00288                               $this->Template = $this->String->show_block( 
00289                                     $this->Template , 'template:'.$PageName , 'template:~'.$PageName , $Changed
00290                               );
00291                         }
00292                         else
00293                         {
00294                               if( $this->String->block_exists( $this->Template , 'template:_default_page' , 
00295                                                                                                                                     'template:~_default_page' ) )
00296                               {
00297                                     $Changed = true;
00298                                     $this->Template = $this->String->show_block( 
00299                                           $this->Template , 'template:_default_page' , 'template:~_default_page' , $Changed
00300                                     );
00301                               }
00302                         }
00303                   }
00304                   catch( Exception $e )
00305                   {
00306                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00307                   }
00308             }

00336             function                process( $File , $PageName , &$Changed )
00337             {
00338                   try
00339                   {
00340                         if( $this->Template === false )
00341                         {
00342                               $this->Template = $this->get_template( $File );
00343                         }
00344                         $this->Template = $this->get_template();
00345 
00346                         $this->try_override_template();
00347                         
00348                         $this->process_template_block( $PageName , $Changed );
00349                         
00350                         $this->Template = $this->String->hide_anonimous_blocks( $this->Template , 'template' , $Changed );
00351                         $BlockName = '';
00352                         for( ; $BlockName = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $this->Template , 'include' ) ; )
00353                         {
00354                               $IncludedTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( $File , "$BlockName.tpl" );
00355                                     
00356                               $this->Template = str_replace( "{include:$BlockName}" , $IncludedTemplate , $this->Template );
00357                               $Changed = true;
00358                         }
00359                   }
00360                   catch( Exception $e )
00361                   {
00362                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00363                   }
00364             }

00392             function                get_placeholder_parameters( $File , $PurePlaceHolderName )
00393             {
00394                   try
00395                   {
00396                         if( $this->Template === false )
00397                         {
00398                               $this->Template = $this->get_template( $File );
00399                         }
00400                         
00401                         if( $this->String->block_exists( $this->Template , $PurePlaceHolderName ) )
00402                         {
00403                               $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $this->Template , $PurePlaceHolderName );
00404                               return( $Params );
00405                         }
00406                         else
00407                         {
00408                               return( false );
00409                         }
00410                   }
00411                   catch( Exception $e )
00412                   {
00413                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00414                   }
00415             }

00443             function                process_color_scheme( $File , $Str )
00444             {
00445                   try
00446                   {
00447                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'color_scheme' ) ; )
00448                         {
00449                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00450                               $Available = explode( ',' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'available' , 'default' ) );
00451                               
00452                               if( array_search( $this->Settings->get_setting( 'color_scheme' , 'default' ) , 
00453                                                                                                                                                 $Available ) !== false )
00454                               {
00455                                     $Str = str_replace( 
00456                                           "{color_scheme:$Params}" , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'color_scheme' , 'default' ) , $Str
00457                                     );
00458                               }
00459                               else
00460                               {
00461                                     $Str = str_replace( "{color_scheme:$Params}" , 'default' , $Str );
00462                               }
00463                         }
00464                         
00465                         return( $Str );
00466                   }
00467                   catch( Exception $e )
00468                   {
00469                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00470                   }
00471             }

00495             function                process_string( $File , $Str )
00496             {
00497                   try
00498                   {
00499                         $Str = str_replace( '{color_scheme}' , '{color_scheme:available=default}' , $Str );
00500                         
00501                         if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( dirname( $File ).'/conf/cf_template_settings' ) )
00502                         {
00503                               $this->Settings->load_file( dirname( $File ).'/conf/cf_template_settings' );
00504                         }
00505                         
00506                         $Str = $this->process_color_scheme( $File , $Str );
00507                         
00508                         $Str = str_replace( '{locale}' , $this->Lang->get_locale() , $Str );
00509                         
00510                         return( $Str );
00511                   }
00512                   catch( Exception $e )
00513                   {
00514                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00515                   }
00516             }

00540             function                cleanup( $File , $PageName )
00541             {
00542                   try
00543                   {
00544                         global            $StartGenerationTime;
00545                         
00546                         if( $this->Template === false )
00547                         {
00548                               $this->Template = $this->get_template( $File );
00549                         }
00550                         
00554                         $PlaceHolders = array( 
00555                               ':)' , ':(' , ';)' , ':))' , ':)))' , ":-\\" , '{template_path}' , '{gen_time}' , '{captcha}' , 
00556                               '[page_name]' , '/./' , '[sharp]' , '[amp]' , '[random]' , '[r]' , '[n]'
00557                         );
00558                         $Subs = array( 
00559                               '{template_path}/res/images/smiles/smile.gif' , '{template_path}/res/images/smiles/frown.gif' , 
00560                               '{template_path}/res/images/smiles/wink.gif' , '{template_path}/res/images/smiles/biggrin.gif' , 
00561                               '{template_path}/res/images/smiles/lol.gif' , '{template_path}/res/images/smiles/smirk.gif' , 
00562                               _get_package_relative_path( $File ) , microtime( true ) - $StartGenerationTime , 
00563                               '{captcha_image}&nbsp;{captcha_field}' , $PageName , '/' , '#' , '&' , rand() , "\r" , "\n"
00564                         );
00565                         $this->Template = str_replace( $PlaceHolders , $Subs , $this->Template );
00566 
00567                         $PlaceHolders = array( '{captcha_image}' , '{captcha_field}' );
00568                         $Subs = array( 
00569                               '<img src="./captcha.html" align="top">' , 
00570                               '<input type="text" class="flat width_100" size="25" name="captcha" value="" '.
00571                                     'style="text-align: center;">'
00572                         );
00573                         $this->Template = str_replace( $PlaceHolders , $Subs , $this->Template );
00574                         
00575                         $this->Template = $this->String->compile_ultimix_tags( $this->Template );
00576                         
00577                         $PlaceHolders = array( 
00578                               '{header}' , '{footer}' , '{title}' , '{some_menu}' , '{pathway}' , '{menu}' , '{error_message}' , 
00579                               '{success_message}' , '{main}' , '{bottom}' , '{banner}' , '{banners}'
00580                         );
00581                         $this->Template = str_replace( $PlaceHolders , '' , $this->Template );
00582                         
00583                         $this->Template = $this->process_string( $File , $this->Template );
00584                         
00585                         $c = 0;
00586                         do
00587                         {
00588                               $PlaceHolders = array();
00589                               
00590                               preg_match( '/\{([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)\}/' , $this->Template , $PlaceHolders );
00591                               $c = count( $PlaceHolders );
00592                               
00593                               if( $c > 1 )
00594                               {
00595                                     $this->Template = str_replace( '{'.$PlaceHolders[ 1 ].'}' , '' , $this->Template );
00596                               }
00597                         }
00598                         while( $c > 1 );
00599                         
00600                         $this->Template = str_replace( array( '[lfb]' , '[rfb]' ) , array( '{' , '}' ) , $this->Template );
00601                   }
00602                   catch( Exception $e )
00603                   {
00604                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00605                   }
00606             }
00607       
00630             function                get_template( $File = '' )
00631             {
00632                   try
00633                   {
00634                         if( $this->Template === false )
00635                         {
00636                               /* чтение шаблона в переменную */
00637                               $this->Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( $File , 'template.tpl' );
00638                         }
00639                         
00640                         /* pre-обработка шаблона завершена, поэтому можно отдавать его клиентским пакетам */
00641                         return( $this->Template );
00642                   }
00643                   catch( Exception $e )
00644                   {
00645                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00646                   }
00647             }
00648

00664             {
00665                   $this->Template = $theTemplate;
00666             }
